author: AirPano VR
description:
Don't forget that this is 360 video: you can change the angle of view.

A narrow chain of the Kuril Islands archipelago, a location of earthquakes, volcanic eruptions, and sunrises, extends from the Kamchatka Peninsula to Japan's Hokkaido in the Pacific Ocean in the southeastern part of Russia.

There is a Brouton Bay in the northern part of the Simushir island. On its shore lies a ghost town called Kraterny. No one has lived here for a long time, and only some tourists come here.

If you enjoyed this video please like, share, comment, favorite, subscribe: https://goo.gl/NZMdaz 
We regularly publish new 360 videos of the most beautiful places on our planet!

360° photos and videos, stories of our shootings, articles and FAQ you can find on our website: http://AirPano.com

title: Abandoned Kuril  Islands. 16K 360° video
